Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Debt and Dinosaur Acquisition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the initial conflict regarding King Guz's debt, Alley Oop's dinosaur troubles, leading to the decision to trade in his old dinosaur and acquire a new one at Honest Zog's dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Debt Confrontation Following Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes King Guz's staged drowning and subsequent confrontation by Alley Oop regarding an unpaid debt.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Troubles and Dealership Visit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop's journey with Bronto Soreness, its breakdown, and the decision to visit Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree
Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Purchase and Farewell
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the justification for trading in the dinosaur, the test drive, the deal confirmation, the purchase despite a biting incident, and the emotional farewell to the old dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership
Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Dinny's Dinosaur Drama
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's initial experiences with his new dinosaur, juxtaposed with Dinny's dinosaur related outburst and charge towards children.

sub_scenes.title: New Dinosaur's Initial Troubles
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop's first ride on the new dinosaur, including a minor accident and Dinny's critical reaction.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense and Charge
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dinny's emotional outburst, his defense of his old dinosaur, and his impulsive charge towards children.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Misunderstandings and Breakup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the romantic troubles of Alley Oop and Ooola, culminating in a breakup and physical altercation, followed by fishing related misogynistic comments.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Breakup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays Alley Oop's invitation to Ooola for fishing, her rejection, and the ensuing argument leading to a breakup.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a separate fishing scenario where men express misogynistic views and engage in petty arguments.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Competition and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores themes of romantic competition and misunderstandings, featuring arguments over Oola's affections and a jealous confrontation that reveals a humorous misunderstanding.

sub_scenes.title: Arguments Over Oola's Affection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a conversation about competition for Oola's attention and conflicting opinions on her feelings.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Misunderstanding Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a jealous confrontation based on a misunderstanding about affections, leading to a physical attack and subsequent clarification.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lessons and Crude Analogy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on romantic advice given to a muscular caveman, using a crude analogy to explain romance.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Gestures and Reactions
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases various romantic gestures and the contrasting reactions they provoke, including flower giving, branch offering, and judgmental commentary.

sub_scenes.title: Flower Offering and Competitive Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene portrays a romantic flower offering and a jealous observer planning to outdo the gesture.

sub_scenes.title: Branch Offering and Crocodile Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a different romantic offering - a leafy branch - which leads to an unexpected confrontation with a crocodile.

sub_scenes.title: Vulgar Tree Climbing Observation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene presents a humorous, judgmental observation of tree climbing, adding a contrasting tone to the romantic gestures.

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Jealousy and Misunderstandings Continued
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues to explore themes of romantic jealousy and misunderstandings, with flashbacks, possessiveness, and humorous resolutions.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback Anger and Possessive Jealousy
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases a flashback of anger over lost love and a scene of intense romantic possessiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Cowardice Accusation and Cannibalism Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features an accusation of cowardice and a dramatic misunderstanding involving cannibalism.

sub_scenes.title: Kissing vs. Eating Fingers Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene resolves a jealous accusation with a humorous clarification of kissing a hand, not eating fingers.

Major_Arcs.title: Infidelity, Guilt, and Romantic Attempts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with themes of infidelity, guilt, and attempts at romantic redemption, showcasing violent reactions to cheating and renewed romantic efforts.

sub_scenes.title: Accusation and Clubbing for Cheating
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a violent reaction to infidelity, with a cavewoman clubbing a 'two-timing scoundrel'.

sub_scenes.title: Guilt, Forgiveness, and Derogatory Comment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a cavewoman expressing guilt and seeking forgiveness, alongside a seemingly unrelated derogatory comment.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic New Leaf and Courtship Gesture
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features a caveman vowing to become romantic and another initiating a courteous courtship gesture.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Frustration with Women
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene returns to a fishing scene, where a caveman expresses frustration with women, circling back to earlier misogynistic themes.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze and its Consequences
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the new dance craze 'the twitch' and its unexpected consequences, including injuries and social pressure to participate.

sub_scenes.title: Twist-Related Injuries
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the phenomenon of injuries caused by attempting 'the twist' dance.

sub_scenes.title: Pressure to Learn the Twitch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the social pressure on Alley to learn 'the twitch' dance for an upcoming party.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson Mishaps and Instructor Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details a 'twitch' dance lesson with humorous mishaps and a surprising instructor name reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Unexpected Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the aftermath of the twitch lesson, including Alley's humiliation and a surprising scene in a hospital ward.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Research and Romantic Interlude
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces time travel as a solution for historical research, leading to a romantic encounter in the past and an unexpected return to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Time Travel Research Proposal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up the idea of using time travel to research 16th-century Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Prehistoric Romantic Scene and Time Travel Interruption
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Alley Oop in a romantic prehistoric setting, interrupted by time travel.

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century Arrival and Spain Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Alley and Oola's arrival in the 20th century and Wonmug's immediate assignment for them in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain
Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment

Major_Arcs.title: Buster's Serenade and Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Buster's disruptive serenade, leading to a confrontation and his unexpected participation in a bullfight as a 'novelty act'.

sub_scenes.title: Disruptive Serenade and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Buster's loud serenade and the negative reactions from neighbors, leading to a physical altercation.

narrative_arcs.title: The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony
The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity
Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act

sub_scenes.title: Novelty Bullfight and Audience Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the 'novelty' bullfight itself and the audience's varied reactions to Buster's performance.

narrative_arcs.title: Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Complications and Time Travel Redux
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features romantic impatience, a flirtatious interlude, a rescue scene, and a misunderstanding involving a scientist and time travel.

sub_scenes.title: Impatient Wait and Flirtatious Reward
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a woman impatiently waiting for information and a separate scene of flirtatious reward.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue and Misunderstanding with Scientist
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a rescue scene followed by a confrontation and misunderstanding involving a scientist and accusations of infidelity.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Manipulated Reign
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', showing the initial glorification, the burden of kingship, and a manipulated temporary reign.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of King for a Day
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the concept of 'King for a Day' and the initial scene of the crowned man being carried.

sub_scenes.title: Throne Confrontation and Kingship Burden Dialogue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation on the throne and a dialogue about the perceived ease of kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Appointment and Mob Rejection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the appointment of a temporary king and the crowd's unexpected negative reaction, revealing a manipulation.

narrative_arcs.title: New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command
Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification
New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Guz and the Queen's Domestic Disputes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around domestic disputes between Guz and the Queen, revolving around bon-bons, dirty feet, and sarcastic compliance.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Indulgence and Ulcer Pill Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Guz enjoying 'bon-bons' which are revealed to be ulcer pills by the Queen.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust
True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

Major_Arcs.title: Rum-Pus, Clams, and Wise Man's Justice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a dispute arising from a game of Rum-Pus, escalating into a fight over found clams, and resolved by a Wise Man's unconventional method.

sub_scenes.title: Rum-Pus Cheating Accusation and Money Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with an accusation of cheating at Rum-Pus and transitions into a physical fight over money.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation
Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

Major_Arcs.title: Recurring Fights, Financial Accusation, and Dinosaur Dinner
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features recurring fights, a financial accusation within the royal court, and anticipation for a dinosaur dinner, highlighting contrasting elements of conflict and royal life.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Outdoor Fight
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the re-emergence of the recurring fight from previous arcs.

sub_scenes.title: Financial Accusation in Royal Court
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a new conflict involving a financial accusation within the royal setting.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner Anticipation and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the announcement of dinosaur dinner, the crowned man's excitement, and a subsequent ulcer warning.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer-Conscious Appetizer and Prank Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the crowned man eating a healthy appetizer due to his ulcer, followed by a sudden prank that turns violent.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies, Ruler Propositions, and Barberous Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a collection of disparate scenes involving apologies, a ruler proposition, and a setup for forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Oompa and Pal's Apologies
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features two separate apology scenarios, one involving Oompa and another with Pal offering food.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Return to Citizen Status and Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes a character's relief at returning to ordinary life and Alley's proposition for someone to become ruler.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction and Roman Soldier
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a scientist's time machine experiment going awry, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman soldier.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Experiment Setup and Execution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the scientist setting up and initiating his time machine experiment to bring someone from the past.
